text: Wͻn akyi no, awoͻ ntotoasoͻ (bͻne) a yεde Nwoma no hyεε wͻn nsa bεhyεε wͻn anan mu, wͻ’faa wiase yi mu ahuhudeε no, na deε wͻ’kaeε ne sε: “Yε’de yεn bͻne bεkyε yεn.“ Sε ahuhudeε a εte saa sεso mpo baa wͻn hͻ a (anka wͻ’bεsan) agye (aka ho). Enti yεnyee apam wͻ wͻn hͻ wͻ Nwoma no mu sε: “Wͻnhwε na wͻn anka biribi annto Nyankopͻn so gyesε nokorε nko ara?” Aberε nso a wͻ’asua deε εwͻ (Nwoma no) mu no.
